data.author: Turner Vink

changelog.release_notes:
- Fancy new config page
- Menu icon!

Vacation Time has been rebuilt from the ground up!
- New config page using Slate
- Fun launch animation
- Supports English, French, Spanish, and German
- Much cleaner code

- Added hourly weather forecast (currently English only)
- Added ability to hide weather forecast
- Battery bar and weather show on shake/tap
- Added battery status bar (with pretty colours!)
- Added colour support for Pebble Time and Pebble Time Steel

- Changed 'del atardecer' to 'del ocaso' to allow for increased font size
- Increased font size

- Changed font sizes to allow for translated strings
- Localization! Vacation Time now supports:
    - English
    - French
    - Spanish
    - German
(I only speak English and the French I've learned in school. If anything is incorrect please let me know! Some accents are not available due to the font.)

data.description:
For when the hours don't matter!

See the progress through the day in 8 easy to read stages with colour-matched backgrounds. Shake to view remaining battery, current "feels-like" temperature, and hourly forecast.

Stages:
midnight (12AM to 2AM)
early morning (3AM to 5AM)
morning (6AM to 8AM)
late morning (9AM to 11AM)
afternoon (12PM to 2PM)
late afternoon (3PM to 5PM)
evening (6PM to 8PM)
night (9PM to 11PM)

latest_release.release_notes:
- Fancy new config page
- Menu icon!

data.title: Vacation Time
